title: A Fable by Aesop: The North wind and the sun (K)
creator_credit: Rhoda Leyer, Les Drew, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An engaging illustration, by animation artist Rhoda Leyer, of the ancient Greek fable in which the warm sun proves to the cold wind that persuasion is better than force when it comes to making a man take off his overcoat. Music by Karl Duplessis.
